full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal: SiForce A Workstation or Equivalent for Royal Canadian Mounted Police

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 2BH3152360/A
* Department: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Notification Period: 14 days (November 27, 2023 to November 9, 2023)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Description of Requirement

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires SiForce A Workstations or equivalent, as outlined in the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.

### Delivery Information

* Delivery Destination: Ottawa, ON
* Delivery Date: 60 federal government working days from contract award

### Security Requirements

* N/A

### Agreement Requirements

* N/A

### Terms and Conditions

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Submissions

* Bids must be submitted only to the Public Services and Procurement Canada (P2P) portal for RFQ Submission by the indicated date, time, and place.
* To access the solicitation and submit a bid, click the following link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information

* Procurement Officer: Michael Boualavong
* Contact Information: 
  - Phone: (613) 402-8895
  - Email: michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca
  - Address: 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8

### Attachments

* Please find the attachments on the P2P portal under the solicitation reference SSC 2BH3152360/A.

Note: Some unnecessary information has been removed to adhere to the 400-word limit. Please refer to the original text for specific details.  The rewritten text has been formatted using markdown for better readability.
